name: EuroPilot Center (EPC)
about: EuroPilot Center (EPC) is a renowned flight school with training locations in Antwerp, Belgium, and Southern California, USA. EPC offers comprehensive training programs for both private and airline pilots, including modular and dual-certification options in EASA and FAA standards. The school boasts a state-of-the-art fleet featuring brand new Textron Aviation Cessna Skyhawks and Diamond DA42 aircraft, as well as advanced Alsim Flight Simulators. EPC emphasizes practical experience, with students gaining 20% more flight hours than other programs, and supports self-study through 24/7 access to theoretical modules. Known for its innovative approach, cost-efficiency, and favorable training weather in California, EPC prepares students for global aviation careers with international recognition. With a passionate and experienced team, EPC is dedicated to making your aviation dreams a reality.
